raw_text:
Got it ✅ — each Shorgan & Dee Combined Report will now open with a visual summary table like this:

📊 Portfolio Snapshot
Bot	Capital	Cash %	Net Exposure	Top Holdings	P&L (Unrealized)
Shorgan (Offense)	$XX,XXX	X%	80% long / 5% short	SOUN, IONQ, BBAI	+$X,XXX (+X%)
Dee (Defense)	$XX,XXX	3%	Beta ≈ 1.0	AAPL, JPM, MSFT, JNJ	+$X,XXX (+X%)

This way you’ll have a quick-glance dashboard before diving into each section (market overview, Shorgan catalysts, Dee defense, combined outlook).

Would you like me to include sector exposure bars (e.g., Tech 45%, Financials 20%, Energy 15%, Staples 10%, Healthcare 10%) in that snapshot as well, or keep it simple with holdings + P&L?
